CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Voice_activation', '', IF( AND( Count_Reservation_Status_INPROGRESS__c = 0, Count_Reservation_Status_ERROR__c = 0, Count_Reservation_Status_SUCCESS__c = 0 ), '', IF( AND( Count_Reservation_Status_INPROGRESS__c = 0, Count_Reservation_Status_ERROR__c = 0, Count_Reservation_Status_SUCCESS__c > 0, Count_Empty_Mobile_Number__c = 0 ), 'SUCCESS', IF( AND( Count_Reservation_Status_SUCCESS__c > 0, Count_Empty_Mobile_Number__c > 0 ), '', IF( Count_Reservation_Status_INPROGRESS__c > 0, 'INPROGRESS', 'ERROR' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Phone Number Reservation Status
